name: Aki and Me
description: There's a place, deep within the forest, that neither human nor elf will travel, lest they wish to parish—no, lest they have a secret, a secret worth the dangerous travels, worth the risk of death to rid of it. It is here that Aki was abandoned and forgotten; it is here that you had wandered in all those years ago, never to wander back out again; and it is here that you and Aki fight to escape from, to cross back into the Elven Lands and share Aki's vision with the world.
